## Lesson Outline

- Visualising Amounts
    - Bar chart
    - Pareto chart
    - Grouped and stacked bars
    - Dot plot
- Visualising Distribution
    - Histogram
    - Density plot

    - Notched boxplot
    - Violin plot
    - Q-Q plot
